attributes.action: not even remotely consider scrapping the Red Arrows.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Red Arrows RAF aerobatic display team are a showcase for all that is still great about Britain, bringing revenue and prestige to this country far beyond its cost - and yet the Red Arrows are under threat from yet another 'spending review'. Make a stand here - please sign our petition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
